title: Solo show tomorrow
content:
Hello all,

I posted this in news but, in case anyone misses it, I have a solo show  
at Electrik Sheep Gallery in Newcastle (UK) starting tomorrow.  
It's original 'type art' and limited edition prints. Any Geordies  
reading come along and say hello if you get the chance.

Sneak preview of one print here:

[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cVhP1J2BA5M](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014113045/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=cVhP1J2BA5M "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cVhP1J2BA5M")

Further details at [www.seblester.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014113045/http:/www.seblester.co.uk/ "www.seblester.co.uk") and [www.electriksheep.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014113045/http:/www.electriksheep.co.uk/ "www.electriksheep.co.uk")

Off to get a train,

Seb
author: Seb Lester

comments.content: Hey congrats! Looks like it will be an awesome show!
